channel.title: racket on Tejbir (Tj) Wason
channel.description: Recent content in racket on Tejbir (Tj) Wason

item.title: Racket notes
item.description: Basic #lang racket (provide (all-defined-out)) ;this is a comment (define s "hello") (define x 3) (define y (+ x 2)) (define cube1 (lambda (x) (* x (* x x)))) (define cube2 (lambda (x) (* x x x))) (define (cube3 x) (* x x x)) (define (pow1 x y) (if (=y 0) 1 (* x (pow1 x (- y 1))))) ; currying (define pow2 (lambda (x) (lambda (y) (pow1 x y)))) List Empty list: null () doesn"t work for null but '() does build a list: (list e1 .
